author: dfinke
body:
## Steps to reproduce

I ran the portability analyzer on https://github.com/robertwilczynski/nChronic and it said it was good to go.

I was able to load up, call methods and get correct results yamldotnet.dll from nuget on PS 6.0.
## Expected behavior

`new-object` should work
## Actual behavior

![image](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/67258/17823767/417e7c26-662c-11e6-880f-05b417936785.png)
## Environment data

![image](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/67258/17823782/57428b92-662c-11e6-8294-3dfd18be0f53.png)
title: DLL fails on New-Object
